name: Slime Me Together
description:
Slime Me Together is a puzzle game about splitting and merging a cute little brainless ball of slime. Your goal is to escape the slime dungeon using your slimy abilities to solve puzzles. The game was made in 48 hours during the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Move your blobby mass using  or and split/merge using . When merging, the small slimes will try to go toward each other to meet unless there is a wall in which case they will bounce, allowing them to reach some places really fast.

The game was made by Pierre Thibault, Vincent Bonino and Stéphane Hulot on a custom game engine we developed during the past few months. The music has been composed by Pierre, level design was done by Vincent and sprites by Stéphane. We all worked on the code too.
